Welcome to Voight-Kampff’s documentation!¶

Voight-Kampff is a Python test which define “replicants”.

Lore: Open Blade Runner Database.

Note

This project is under active development.

About version¶

EX00 is an old version of test. This version of the test with strict restrictions, without input json and pytest support. But, in contrast of ex01, it makes a history about participants.

Instructions¶

  1. Go to the main directory

  2. Run ‘python main.py’

  3. Follow the instructions

At the main part of test you will need to collect an anamnesis about the participant after each question answered by him. Than you will get a final decision.

File with test cases:¶

This file contains buisness logic. Here you may find test cases for each person.

… :param age: contains the number of answer for question about age :type age: int :param money: contains the number of answer for question about money :type money: int :param mood: contains the number of answer for question about mood :type mood: int :param death: contains the number of answer for question about death :type death: int :param sex: contains the number of answer for question about sex :type sex: int :param condition: contains changing of person condition :type condition: list

tests.analysis_tests.test_age(age, condition)¶

Checks that old people started breath more often on question about sex

… :param age: contains the number of answer for question about age :type age: int :param condition: contains changing of person condition :type condition: list

tests.analysis_tests.test_money(money, condition)¶

Checks that heart of angry people started moving faster

… :param money: contains the number of answer for question about money :type money: int :param condition: contains changing of person condition :type condition: list

tests.analysis_tests.test_mood(mood, death)¶

Checks that people who always thinking about death not feeling “awesome”.

… :param mood: contains the number of answer for question about mood :type mood: int :param condition: contains changing of person condition :type condition: list

tests.analysis_tests.test_president(condition)¶

Checks that people not worried too much on question about president.

… :param condition: contains changing of person condition :type condition: list

tests.analysis_tests.test_sex(sex, condition)¶

Checks that people with pair started blushing on questing about sex after question about his boy/girl/hs/wf.

… :param sex: contains the number of answer for question about sex :type sex: int :param condition: contains changing of person condition :type condition: list
